name: appwrite
description: Appwrite is a secure, open-source backend server that provides auth, file storage, databases, functions, and realtime APIs. It powers web, mobile, and Flutter apps and supports self-hosting with Docker and Kubernetes.
features: Backend-as-a-Service: Complete backend solution for web, mobile, and Flutter apps. Everything you need.
Authentication: Built-in user management with multiple auth methods. Secure and simple.
Database: NoSQL database with real-time subscriptions and queries. Fast and flexible.
File Storage: Secure file upload, storage, and delivery with image manipulation. Media made easy.
Cloud Functions: Run serverless functions in multiple languages. Extend functionality.
Real-Time APIs: WebSocket support for live data updates. Instant synchronization.
Self-Hosted: Full control with Docker and Kubernetes deployment. Your backend, your rules.
